description: Equip: Blade Dance has a 30% chance to grant you Chaotic Blades, increasing the damage of Chaos Strike by 50% and its chance to refund Fury by an additional 60% for 8 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Blazing Slaughter:

The Hunt engulfs you with Immolation Aura upon reaching your target and you gain 4% Agility for 12 sec for each enemy hit.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Glory:

Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 25 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.
Equip: Activating Bladestorm, Recklessness, or Avatar randomly casts one of the other two abilities at reduced effectiveness.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Abomination's Frenzy:

Abomination Limb's duration is increased by 4 sec and the frequency it grants Runic Corruption is increased by 2 sec. The first time an enemy is damaged by Abomination Limb they take 20% increased damage from you for 12 sec.
Equip: Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 12%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.
